alert.note: Alert for Pocahontas; Randolph (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 4:24PM EDT until July 23 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Charleston West Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Randolph County in northeastern West Virginia... Central Pocahontas County in northeastern West Virginia... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 424 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Marlinton, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Marlinton, Cass Scenic Railroad, Snowshoe, Mingo, Durbin, Edray, Cheat Bridge, Bartow, Slaty Fork, Valley Head and Boyer. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
